    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange exchange)
            throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used for handling login requests. Using POST method, gets login data from client and makes new account. User.register(String, String)

        input is JSON object from client that has `id`, `pw`, and `key` property.

        • `id` id to login
        • `pw` encrypted password to login
        • `key` key to encrypt token when login is success
        When the login is success, it will send back JSON object that has `success`, `token` property
        • `success` true if register succeeded
        • `token` token to use for every logged-in action
        • `code` failure code when login failed
        Specified by:
        handle in interface com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
        Specified by:
        handle in class SecureHttpHandler
        Parameters:
        exchange - http exchange object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - from BufferedReader when input is not properly working.
